en-US.title: Metamorphosis Medical Center
en-US.description: A safe, nurturing, and informed consent clinic led by Dr. Kristen Vierregger providing personalized therapies to Transgender, Non-binary, and Gender-expansive community. Offers transition-related medical services intending to realize the true health and well-being potential of each patient. Commits to uphold values such as Love, Equity, Peace, and Truth, providing a patient-focused environment.

address: Slomann Building, 8081 Stanton Ave #300, Buena Park, CA 90620, USA
